meals.name: Yogurt Parfait
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add yogurt to a bowl
Layer with strawberries and granola
Mix in soy protein powder

meals.name: Protein Pancakes
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Heat a pan
Pour batter and cook until golden

meals.name: Berry Smoothie
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to a blender
Blend until smooth
Serve cold

meals.name: Overnight Oats
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients
Store in a jar
Refrigerate overnight

meals.name: Smoothie Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Blend all ingredients
Pour into a bowl
Add toppings if desired

meals.name: Tofu Rice Cakes
meals.cooking_instructions:
Pan-fry tofu
Place lettuce and tofu on rice cakes
Serve

meals.name: Protein Bites
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all ingredients in a bowl
Roll into balls
Chill in fridge

meals.name: Mango Yoghurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Blend mango with oat milk and protein powder
Serve chilled

meals.name: Protein Waffles
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix ingredients
Pour into waffle maker
Cook until crisp

meals.name: Lentils Pasta
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook Vegan Pasta until al dente
Cook lentils pasta
Season crumbled tempeh
Bake Soy Beans and Tempeh
Combine and serve

meals.name: Tofu Wrap
meals.cooking_instructions:
Pan-fry tofu
Add tofu and lettuce to wrap
Roll and serve

meals.name: Pear Yoghurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Blend all ingredients or serve in layers
Stir before eating

meals.name: Banana Smoothie
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth

meals.name: Protein Bar
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix ingredients
Shape into bars
Chill in fridge

meals.name: Tofu Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Crumble tofu into bowl
Add berries and oats on top

meals.name: Hummus Rice Cakes
meals.cooking_instructions:
Spread hummus on rice cakes
Top with cucumber slices and edamame

meals.name: Mexican Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook white rice
Sauté tofu
Assemble with beans and guacamole

meals.name: Poke Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook rice
Cube tofu and sauté or marinate
Slice avocado and cucumber
Assemble in bowl

meals.name: Pizza Rounds
meals.cooking_instructions:
Slice potato into rounds
Bake potato rounds until golden brown
Season and bake tempeh

Add tomato sauceand vegan cheese to the potato
Add tempeh to the rounds and bake until cheese is molten

meals.name: Chicken & Rice
meals.cooking_instructions:
Cook white and cauliflower rice
Sauté tempeh
Combine all and serve

meals.name: Berries Yogurt
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix oat milk and soy protein powder
Add berries
Top with granola

meals.name: Raspberry Bowl
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth/nAdd ice cubes and blend/nRepeat until preferred thickness

meals.name: Raspberry Shake
meals.cooking_instructions:
Add all ingredients to blender
Blend until smooth

meals.name: Berry Ice Cream
meals.cooking_instructions:
Freeze strawberries
Blend with milk and protein powder until creamy

meals.name: Mug Cake
meals.cooking_instructions:
Mix all in a mug
Microwave for 1-2 minutes
Let cool slightly
